name: banana-ai-assistant
description: Banana AI Assistant - Your AI-powered productivity companion
author: Banana AI Team

scripts.start: npm run build -- --configuration development && npx http-server dist/frontend/browser -p 4200 -c-1 --cors
scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run build -- --configuration production --base-href ./ && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run build -- --configuration production --base-href ./ && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --win
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run build -- --configuration production --base-href ./ && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --mac
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run build -- --configuration production --base-href ./ && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --linux
